instructions.name: deposit_rewards
docs: Deposits SOL rewards into the fee vault.
If no stakers exist, transfer the SOL (after buffer) to the fallback wallet
and do NOT update total_rewards.

docs: New admin function to set the fallback wallet.

errors.name: TokenAddressNotSet
errors.msg: Token address has not been set

errors.name: TokenMismatch
errors.msg: Token mismatch: incorrect SPL token account

errors.name: InsufficientVaultFunds
errors.msg: Fee vault does not have enough SOL

errors.name: NoUnstakedTokens
errors.msg: No unstaked tokens available to claim

fields.name: total_staked
docs: Total tokens currently staked (in SPL token units).

fields.name: total_rewards
docs: Total SOL rewards deposited (in lamports).

fields.name: acc_reward_per_share
docs: Accumulated reward per share, scaled by MULTIPLIER.

fields.name: reward_offset
docs: The global offset for rewards deposited before any stakers.

fields.name: last_stake_slot
docs: Slot of the most recent stake action.

fields.name: current_slot_staked
docs: Total tokens staked in the current slot.

fields.name: pending_distribution_rewards
docs: Total rewards pending distribution from previous blocks.

fields.name: reward_debt
docs: reward_debt is the user's share of the (adjusted) accumulator at the time of their last stake/unstake/claim.

fields.name: unstaked_pending
docs: Tokens that have been unstaked but are still locked and pending claim.

fields.name: unstake_lockup_time
docs: Lockup period for unstaking (set when staking occurs).

fields.name: redeem_lockup_time
docs: Lockup period for redeeming (set when unstaking occurs).

types.name: StakingInfoData
docs: New return type for our getter instruction.

fields.name: pending_rewards
docs: Computed pending rewards.

fields.name: time_until_claimable
docs: Time (in seconds) until unstaked tokens are claimable.
